title: I hate how people keep trying to pull that pick order bullshit on me.
body:
"Like I know it says top underneath my name but like I'm first pick so I'm going adc."

Thats not how dynamic queue works.

replies.body:
Riot has outright stated that stealing another lane without your teammate's agreement is reportable.

A lot of them shape up pretty quickly when they hear that, though some aren't bright enough to care.
What reportable offense does it fall under?
I would think griefing
Lyte [told](https://twitter.com/RiotLyte/status/689646508447178753) that it goes under unsportmanlike conduct.
Does refusing to communicate w/ team still exist? I'd assume that as well as griefing.
unsportman like conduct, something like that

> [{quoted}](name=TsunamiWave22,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=h43PQXMM,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-12T20:53:08.599+0000)
>
> What reportable offense does it fall under?

Yah exactly I usually just report them for the top one.
How do the automated systems pick up on it?
Thats funny because last time this happened i was the one who got punished for being toxic.

If you were toxic as a result of having your role stolen (i.e. insulting others, raging in chat, asking for reports, trolling, etc), then your behaviour was also punishable.

Retaliating to toxic behaviour is not an excuse to be toxic yourself since all it does is further ruin the game for the rest of the players on your team.
But the deed has been done. Either you dodge or you comply with the troll and give up your lane, which can ruin the game. This is why the tribunal needs to control the champion select.

I don't go into that mode. If Riot doesn't even care enough to keep the mode **I and many others enjoyed** then I have no business playing their new mode that I (for a fact) **do not enjoy** for more reasons than many can say about Team Builder. 

No, new Draft Pick does not have everything the original had.

No, I don't feel that it was all the way thought out. 
Ex. Why have a need to pick two roles? Why not have that as a option? With the loss of Dominion and Team Builder, there shouldn't be a long wait anymore... maybe its the feeling of being forced out of our comfort zones that alienates us.

No, I am not guaranteed my choice in champion (or role).

Yes, I like the new look.

I have never liked Draft Pick. Its better than Blind Pick. Not why I only used Team Builder. 

Is new Draft Pick rewarding? Only when every person gets their choice champs and positions. No "dodge" options to allow for both a person who might want said position and for the other to find their position they might want. Heck, why put all 5 players into champ select before they know their positions?

Queue times would be longer if only one role was chosen or if the player could see that he isn't getting his preferred role. I liked Team Builder, but I could only play support to get a reasonable queue time. Also, it was impossible to change champions to better fit the team composition. All things considered, I think new champion select is an upgrade.
Anyone else never have this happen to them ever??
It's very easy to claim asssholery is an epidemic on the boards for free upvotes.

Dude, i have never had anything bad happen to me while dynamic q has been out. 
-> No one has never stolen my role
-> No one has never banned my pick intent
->The biggest Que time i ever had was 5:45 seconds ( I was Queing as Mid/jg)
i really think this was the people listing off reasons/QQing about why dynamic que shouldn't have come out. So they're just making QQ threads so riot will remove it. idk just a thought.
Only the first is true for me. Queue times sometimes will take 20-30 minutes for me (I queue for jungle/top).
I switched to that, a lot of people love jungling and going top for their secondary xD
I'd like to, but I prefer jungling more, and jg/mid gives me that nearly every single time. Even though I would much rather lane on top, lol

In the past, mid lane was the most popular lane. It's weird how nowadays it's top or jungle, but I guess it's because Mages are underpowered at the moment. Hopefully the Mage Patch will return some people to the mid lane.
Then consideryourself lu ky. Ive had 20+min qs in silver. My intents have indeed been banned.

> [{quoted}](name=Senpai Adam,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=h43PQXMM,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-03-12T18:38:23.290+0000)
>
> "Like I know it says top underneath my name but like I'm first pick so I'm going adc."
> 
> Thats not how dynamic queue works.

I'll be honest as much as I hate dynamic queue and the fact you can premade groups, I've never had this happen to me.
Couple of times here.

If someone wants to go ADC in the top lane I don't see what the problem is. Didn't Riot themselves posted they think it's acceptable to put someone like that there and used Urgot as an example? I have played Sivir in top lane and find it very good personally. If they meant that they are demanding the support to assist them in lane then yeah maybe that's not so good in terms of manners, but if they are okay with solo then or if you're not even the bot lane and the bot lane guy doesn't care then you're making a big deal out of nothing IMHO.

----Point--->

[Your head]

> [{quoted}](name=SanKakU,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=h43PQXMM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-03-12T18:58:55.963+0000)
>
> If someone wants to go ADC in the top lane I don't see what the problem is. Didn't Riot themselves posted they think it's acceptable to put someone like that there and used Urgot as an example? I have played Sivir in top lane and find it very good personally. If they meant that they are demanding the support to assist them in lane then yeah maybe that's not so good in terms of manners, but if they are okay with solo then or if you're not even the bot lane and the bot lane guy doesn't care then you're making a big deal out of nothing IMHO.

No he went bot lane. When he was supposed to go top.
well maybe you should've posted that and some more information to begin with. such a short post really leaves a lot to the imagination.

He didnt need to post more than that because most people understand that when someone says " it gave me top but im going adc", it means they are not playing top lane and going to go bot lane as an adc.

If the player were to go with a marksman top lane, that statement would NOT have been said.

Use your head. That is like the time when i called adc and one of my teammates said "ok what lane" and i said "uh bot since that is where the adc goes" and their response "well any ad champ can be an adc" and i just facepalmed at that point because of how stupid that guy was. Everyone knows Top, Jg, Mid, ADC and Support are the roles. Dont try to be cute and make up something stupid.
someone calling bot adc instead of bot is the one that's making up something stupid.

Actually, calling bot adc instead of just adc is making up something stupid since most people know that the adc goes bot lane.

I can understand SOME confusion since bot lane has 2 roles (adc and support) but i blame that on Riot since they put "bot" as a role instead of "adc" since that is what everyone knows.

But my point still stands. Had the guy getting the top lane role wanted to go with a marksman and stay top, that phrase would NOT have been uttered as he would stay in top lane and not make that announcement. But most people know that if someone says what that guy said, he has no intention of staying top lane. Its common sense.
the bot lane can be apc instead, therefore your argument is irrelevant. it could also be a non-ranged champion if the support is favorable for it.

absolutely not. if you want to try that in solo q go for it. but in the real made up world of lol, apc doesnt help and non-ranged champs hinder bot lane.

it puts more strain on the rest of the team because with a non-ranged champ, you are going up against a ranged champ. i cant tell you how many mordes i went against in bot lane after the rework and i completely destroyed that lane. he may have also been in the LCS but that was short lived as the match ups proved to be too much for him.

As for the apc, i still have yet to see 1 decent apc in bot lane that doesnt totally bomb and that includes teemo. mainly because apcs suffer in the early game since they dont have the burst they need whereas the adc can buy a bf sword and completely win every trade and make them fall behind. not to mention that all i have to do is buy a maw of malmortius and a mercurial scimitar and make all that damage completely null and void. what can an apc do against a adc? void staff? all i have to do is keep piling on the MR and that void staff wont mean shit to me. i actually had a teemo do that once and i walked over his mushrooms without a care in the world cuz it didnt do shit to me.

therefore YOUR argument is irrelevant.
I think you just didn't get the memo.

i wasn't in hie game so there's no reason i would get the memo. i didn't see a video of the game being played that he mentioned so once again no reason i would get a memo. if you can't be bothered to realize that i was not involved then you'd realize he is just venting about his poor quality experience and not communicating with friends that witnessed what happened. if you bore witness to his poor quality experience then good for you. you got a memo. if you didn't, then you obviously don't know what you're posting about.

it's not a game specific memo. its more of a common sense thing concerning the fact that adc is generally considered the bot role, like ho morde is called an adc sometimes even though he isn't one. so its probably worth thinking that when a post like this goes to the boards it probably has to do with the fact that the top laner was going bot. especially concerning the fact that the pick order was mentioned to give information.


it wasn't long, but it was very informative.

adc is acronym for attack damage carry so if you're building AP or armor etcetera instead of attack damage you can't possibly be the adc and this logic is stupid because it's misusing the words in it.

adc is also a quick note to the not support bottom lane role, it's used often in typing because its more quick to type. the terms are interchangeable due to use, adc's until recently were forced into bot lane every game, except for weak builds that were ineffective in comparison.
It's generally understood that the term "adc" refers to the position in the bot lane. And it was pretty clear from the context what he was referring to.
so IOW everyone that plays lol is an illiterate moron that forgot what adc means? i don't believe you.

That's kind of how language works. Phrases and terms take on different meanings than what they "literally" mean. For example: "I could care less" literally means that you do still care a little, but it is used to say that you don't care at all. 

Another example is the fact that "adc" was originally used for any champion that focused entirely on dealing lots of physical dps (Master Yi, for example), but later evolved to refer almost solely to the ranged "marksman" class. And, because marksmen were almost exclusively played in bot lane (until recently), "adc" is now used to refer to the position even more regularly than to refer to the class. So, technically, you forgot what adc means, too.

Just go to youtube or google and search "adc (any champion name)".  You can find videos and guides showing how to play basically any mage (for example) in the bot lane with an AD build. And they are titled as "ADC Bard", "ADC Vel'Koz", etc, even though they aren't marksmen.
I just hope this is sarcasm.
Checked his profile, he has spurts where he decides to troll the forums.
the amount of obliviousness is amazing here.
It was draft. You get assigned one role in draft. Call order does not matter here. Unless the other laners agree to trade. Welcome to Season 6.

> [{quoted}](name=Cpt Lemmiwinks,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=h43PQXMM,comment-id=000800040000,timestamp=2016-03-13T05:39:36.994+0000)
>
> you obviously do not play in bronze. 


Sure. Let's say that. {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
